title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state increase taxes, decrease government spending, or decrease transfer payments.
The response states increase taxes, decrease government spending, or decrease transfer payments.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes the first criterion below, but not the second.
The response accurately includes both criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes both of the criteria below.
